description:
In Beast Busters, the undead have taken over the city, and it's up to three tough guys to stop them! Clear the invasion only to face unusual bosses, and pray to whatever deity that you'll be able to make it out alive.

And in S.A.R. Search and Rescue, infiltrate a crashed spaceship that had vanished off its course, and battle hordes of alien monsters and robots.

Please download v1.02 patch in order to install DLC properly.
name: Beast Busters & S.A.R. Search and Rescue
